content: According to the January 1, 2023, 52-week IRI energy category SPINS MULO+C data, representing the calendar year for 2022, Celsius is the #1 brand driver of growth in the energy category in all of 2022, responsible for 22% of the category dollar growth, driving $474 million approximately in incremental retail sales for the category. On Amazon, Celsius is the second largest energy drink brand with a 16.94% share in the category, ahead of Red Bull, which is at 11.71% share and just behind Monster, which is at a 26.38% share year-over-year periods as of February 11, 2023, per Stackline, Total Energy, Total U.S.  Amazon full year 2022 sales hit a record for us at $58 million versus the prior year, which totaled $32 million, which, as we stated earlier, was up 83%.
